text: The men's 4 × 100 metres relay event at the 2018 African Championships in Athletics was held on 2 and 3 August in Asaba, Nigeria.Results ==Medalists== {| |- |width=200 valign=top|' Henricho Bruintjies Simon Magakwe Emile Erasmus Akani Simbine Ncincihli Titi* |width=200 valign=top|' Ogho-Oghene Egwero Ejowvokoghene Oduduru Emmanuel Arowolo Seye Ogunlewe Enoch Olaoluwa Adegoke* |width=200 valign=top|' Néhémiah N'Goran Gnamien Hua Wilfried Koffi Arthur Cissé Ben Youssef Méité |} *Athletes who competed in heats only ==Results== ===Heats=== Qualification: First 3 teams of each heat (Q) plus the next 2 fastest (q) qualified for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;font-size:95%" |- !Rank !!
